html: By this—By this manner of God's dealing with them. When—Which sin of Jacob's shall be purged, when he shall truly repent of all his sins, and especially of his idolatry. Altar—Their idolatrous altars. Possibly he may say the altar, with respect to that particular altar, which Ahaz had set upon the place of God's own altar; and this prophecy might be delivered in Ahaz's time, while that altar stood. Chalk—stones—When he shall break all those goodly altars in pieces. Not stand—Shall be thrown down with contempt.
